author: smuzaffar
body: In CPP23_X, there are many build errors like [a]. This change should fix all these error. [a] ``` 48868 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:166:12: error: cannot bind non-const lvalue reference of type 'cms::Exception&' to an rvalue of type 'cms::Exception' 2 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:166:12: error: cannot bind non-const lvalue reference of type 'cond::persistency::Exception&' to an rvalue of type 'cond::persistency::Exception' 2216 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:166:12: error: cannot bind non-const lvalue reference of type 'edm::Exception&' to an rvalue of type 'edm::Exception' 26 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:166:12: error: cannot bind non-const lvalue reference of type 'TritonException&' to an rvalue of type 'TritonException' 2 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:166:12: error: cannot bind non-const lvalue reference of type 'VertexException&' to an rvalue of type 'VertexException' 251 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:166:12: error: non-const lvalue reference to type 'cms::Exception' cannot bind to a temporary of type 'cms::Exception' 7 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:166:12: error: non-const lvalue reference to type 'edm::Exception' cannot bind to a temporary of type 'edm::Exception' 4 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:173:12: error: cannot bind non-const lvalue reference of type 'cms::Exception&' to an rvalue of type 'cms::Exception' 2 FWCore/Utilities/interface/Exception.h:180:12: error: cannot bind non-const lvalue reference of type 'cms::Exception&' to an rvalue of type 'cms::Exception' ```
title: [CPP23][FW] Fix for non-const lvalue reference of type E
